programme.title: Surviving the Game
programme.desc: Chosen to lead hunters (Rutger Hauer, Charles S. Dutton) on an expedition, a homeless man (Ice-T) discovers he is to be their prey.

programme.title: Three Kings
programme.desc: Near the end of the Gulf War, soldiers (George Clooney, Mark Wahlberg, Ice Cube) use a map that may lead them to gold that Saddam Hussein stole from Kuwait.

programme.title: The Black Six
programme.desc: Righteous biker Bubba (Gene Washington) and his five war buddies go south to avenge his slain brother.

programme.title: Big Mo
programme.desc: Cincinnati Royal Jack Twyman (Bo Svenson) spends years helping paralyzed teammate Maurice Stokes (Bernie Casey).

programme.title: Action Jackson
programme.desc: An Ivy League Detroit policeman (Carl Weathers) steals an auto tycoon's (Craig T. Nelson) mistress (Vanity) and stops his gang of assassins.

programme.title: It's Showtime at the Apollo
programme.desc: Rising comics and singers are showcased.

programme.title: It's Showtime at the Apollo
programme.desc: Host Sinbad; music guest Living Colour; music guests BeBe and CeCe Winans; comics James Stevens and Laura Hayes.

programme.title: It's Showtime at the Apollo
programme.desc: Ashford and Simpson sing; Shinehead performs; comedy by Willie Asbury and Louis Ramey.

programme.title: It's Showtime at the Apollo
programme.desc: Rob Base and DJ E-Z Rock, Omar Chandler, Gerald Alston perform, comedy by Phil Nee and Bradley Lowery.

programme.title: Bad to the Jones
programme.desc: Two brothers search for their missing sister during a zombie outbreak.

programme.title: The Ideal Husband
programme.desc: A couple are happily awaiting their first child until a secret threatens to destroy their happiness.

programme.title: Married to a Baller
programme.desc: A woman is married to a pro football player who suffers a career-ending injury. Attracted to money and fame, she leaves him for another man.

programme.title: Waiting for Angels
programme.desc: Jack lies dying in a hospital bed, but his family is more concerned with the money he will leave behind than caring for him. As the family falls apart only one thing can save it.

programme.title: Judge Dad
programme.desc: Julian sues his ex-girlfriend Christina for her half of the remaining rent on their lease after she packed up and moved out without notice; Christina says she caught Julian cheating on the doggie cam and that she had enough.

programme.title: Judge Dad
programme.desc: Cooper sues his ex-girlfriend Alicia for the money he spent taking care of her, claiming she faked a positive pregnancy test; Alicia claims she suffered a miscarriage due to the emotional tumultuous relationship they shared.

programme.title: Judge Mom
programme.desc: Shortly after Marc purchased a TV, girlfriend Shelly told Marc she had met someone else and he needed to move out.

programme.title: Crime Stoppers: Case Files
programme.desc: Catalina Piedra was murdered at home; WWII veteran Phillip Gossett was murdered in his apartment.

programme.title: Crime Stoppers: Case Files
programme.desc: On November 3, 2000, 21-year-old music talent Anthony Prudhomme was murdered after his home was broken into while sleeping; on May 16, 2010, aspiring lawyer Edwinta Hereford was murdered with her body discovered on the side of a freeway.

programme.title: Carmen: A Hip Hopera
programme.desc: An engaged Philadelphia policeman (Mekhi Phifer) falls in love with a beautiful woman (Beyoncé Knowles) while dealing with a corrupt superior (Mos Def).

programme.title: Krush Groove
programme.desc: Desperate to start his own company, a record producer (Blair Underwood) unwisely borrows from a loan shark (Lisa Gay Hamilton).

programme.title: Round Midnight
programme.desc: A jazz saxophonist (Dexter Gordon) from New York has a friend (François Cluzet) on the Left Bank of 1959 Paris.
